title: Hex tech Trading?
body: Do you guys think this could be a thing or do you think it be a cool idea ill leave a poll cast you thoughts and vote in poll

replies.body: i would  like it but im pretty sure riot wouldn't consider something like this as people could trade with their smurfs.
a fix for this could be 3-5 trades a month  and a way they can make money is buying more trades with rp
a fix for this could be 3-5 trades a month
It'll never happen. Creating a secondary market for Riot's virtual goods will dramatically devalue what they make money off of.
Maybe not, but it never hurts to ask.
Something similar happens in MapleStory, and because of that, the meso economy is extremely inflated.

Do please take note that the thread we were talking about ending hate in LoL was taken down.

Sorry, just had to let you know.
Oh yeah, I'm very well aware. I was suspended from the Boards for 1-day due to the area of discussion being too "sensitive".
